title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties  Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, indicating them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, making them stand out even worse. This issue is not observed on windows.
EB: The text fields in the Project Properties Info page should be created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels. This way, their values can be selected and copied by the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Project Properties dialog.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe the text fields and their appearance on motif platforms.
